author: Kolkata Bureau
text: With a section of the State Pradesh Congress having complained to the party High Command earlier this week that the Pradesh Election Committee was not constituted according to party regulations, a crucial meeting on Saturday, to work out seat sharing options with the Left Front, was cancelled. The West Bengal Congress president, Adhir Ranjan Chowdhury, however, reiterated that the Left and the Congress would share “90-95 per cent” seats.
title: Bengal Congress cancels meet
